scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail --kill-signal SIGTERM --names "backend,frontend,browser" --prefix-colors "blue,green,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:browser"
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:backend && npm run format:check:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
